item.title: Day Against DRM at O'Reilly: 50% discount on "Learning CFEngine 3" and all other ebooks
item.description:
Today, May 4th, 2012, O'Reilly Media is participating in support of the FSF'sÂ Day Against DRM. All O'Reilly ebooks and videos are DRM-free, and to celebrate this, you can get 50% off on any purchase by using the code DRMFREE.
I'm proud to participate. Learning CFEngine 3 is also available as a DRM-free ebook, and you can use this code to get it at half price. Here's the message from O'Reilly.
